## Public Member Functions

### beginBasicBlockSection() {#a4a39b36e2558580b82448046a957b229}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void DwarfCFIException::beginBasicBlockSection (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &amp; MBB)</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sys/process">Process</a> the beginning of a new basic-block-section within a function.

Always called immediately after beginFunction for the first basic-block. When basic-block-sections are enabled, called before the first block of each such section.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/asmprinter/dwarfexception-h/#l00062">62</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/asmprinter/dwarfexception-h">DwarfException.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/asmprinter/dwarfcfiexception-cpp/#l00102">102</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/asmprinter/dwarfcfiexception-cpp">DwarfCFIException.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### beginFunction() {#af2d29f19a7e1b49d4ecf82154691a33d}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void DwarfCFIException::beginFunction (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction">MachineFunction</a> &#42; MF)</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
Gather pre-function exception information.

Assumes being emitted immediately after the function entry point.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/asmprinter/dwarfexception-h/#l00057">57</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/asmprinter/dwarfexception-h">DwarfException.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/asmprinter/dwarfcfiexception-cpp/#l00059">59</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/asmprinter/dwarfcfiexception-cpp">DwarfCFIException.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### endBasicBlockSection() {#a43ad56f21d39d07911749e59241bffd3}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void DwarfCFIException::endBasicBlockSection (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &amp; MBB)</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sys/process">Process</a> the end of a basic-block-section within a function.

When basic-block-sections are enabled, called after the last block in each such section (including the last section in the function). When basic-block-sections are disabled, called at the end of a function, immediately prior to markFunctionEnd.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/asmprinter/dwarfexception-h/#l00063">63</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/asmprinter/dwarfexception-h">DwarfException.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/asmprinter/dwarfcfiexception-cpp/#l00141">141</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/asmprinter/dwarfcfiexception-cpp">DwarfCFIException.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
